name: POWPOW Shoot
description:
This is our first game jam. Also both of our's first "released" game.

This game is pretty simple. You will run into ghosts (100hp). Every 2 mins 1 super ghost (1000hp) (1.5x move) appears.  And every 10 mins 5 super ghosts (1000hp) (1.5x move) appear.

The goal of the game is to see how long you can survive.

There are 3 guns:

- Pistol (50 dmg per bullet) (default)
- Shotgun (50 dmg per bullet)
- Machine Gun (20 dmg per bullet)

Credits:
